item.title: Hello World
item.description: Starting off with one of the most over-used tropes in programming to introduce another, a tech/random thoughts/brain dump blog. What this blog is: A place for me to write breakdowns of new topics that I encounter while working as a back-end Ruby on Rails dev An opportunity to improve my understanding of CS related topics via writing hopefully useful guides/ TIL (Today I learned) style posts A distraction from the bug tickets I am supposed to be fixing… What this blog isn’t: A comprehensive source of knowledge on any topics posted The ‘right’ way to do things Interesting (I don’t expect anyone to read this but if one person can be helped by anything written here then that would be great) Hopefully I can share a few useful things on here and if anyone wants to get in contant please see my GH and LinkedIn linked above.
item.content:
Starting off with one of the most over-used tropes in programming to introduce another, a tech/random thoughts/brain dump blog.

What this blog is:

  • A place for me to write breakdowns of new topics that I encounter while working as a back-end Ruby on Rails dev
  • An opportunity to improve my understanding of CS related topics via writing hopefully useful guides/ TIL (Today I learned) style posts
  • A distraction from the bug tickets I am supposed to be fixing…

What this blog isn’t:

  • A comprehensive source of knowledge on any topics posted
  • The ‘right’ way to do things
  • Interesting (I don’t expect anyone to read this but if one person can be helped by anything written here then that would be great)

Hopefully I can share a few useful things on here and if anyone wants to get in contant please see my GH and LinkedIn linked above.

Cheers!
